Privacy Policy

Tourist Junction Pvt. Ltd. We values your trust and is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application (the "App") designed for vehicle owners, service providers, and other users in the automobile industry.

Please read this policy carefully. By using the App, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

A. Information We Collect

a. Personal Information

  • Name, contact details, address, email, phone number, and any other details provided during registration.
  • Documents such as driver’s license, RC, insurance, PUC, tax permits, and fitness certificates.

b. Vehicle Details

  • Trip details, route plans, vehicle photos, trip expenses, maintenance logs, and related documents.

c. User Activity

  • Details of trips, expenses, garage service records, and communication with service providers.

d. Device Information

  • IP address, device type, operating system, and other technical details for improving the App’s functionality.

e. Location Data

  • Geolocation data to connect users with local mechanics, drivers, and services.

B. How We Use Your Information

a. To Provide Services

  • Facilitate trip planning, route creation, and connection with mechanics, electricians, and service providers.
  • Maintain records of vehicle documents and garage activities.

b. To Improve User Experience

  • Enhance app performance and features based on user feedback and behavior.
  • Provide tailored service recommendations based on location and usage patterns.

c. Communication

  • Send updates, notifications, and service-related messages.
  • Facilitate communication between users and service providers.

d. Compliance and Security

  • Ensure legal and regulatory compliance.
  • Prevent misuse, fraud, and unauthorized access to the App.

C. Information Sharing and Disclosure

a. With Service Providers

  • Share user and vehicle details with service providers like mechanics, drivers, and technicians for fulfilling service requests.

b. With Other Users

  • Allow users to view relevant details (e.g., driver profiles, vehicle details) to facilitate connections.

c. Legal Requirements

  • Disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights and interests.

d. Business Transfers

  • In case of mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales, user information may be transferred to the new entity.

D. Data Retention

We retain your information as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Users may request data deletion by contacting us at **[Insert Contact Email]**.

E. Security Measures

We implement technical, administrative, and physical safeguards to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

F. Your Choices

  • **Access and Correction**: You can view and update your profile information through the App.
  • **Data Sharing**: Opt-out of sharing certain data by disabling relevant permissions in your device settings.
  • **Notifications**: Adjust notification preferences within the App settings.

G. Children’s Privacy

The App is not intended for users under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

H. Third-Party Services

The App may link to third-party services or websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Please review their privacy policies before using these services.

I. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be communicated through the App or other channels. Continued use of the App signifies acceptance of the updated policy.

J. Contact Us

For questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:
